diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AC$ is $20$ units.
The length of the line $BM$ is $30$ units.
The length of the line $CM$ is $12$ units.
Point $M$ lies on the line connecting $C$ and $B$.
The line connecting $A$ and $M$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $M$ and $C$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AM$, $BM$, forming the triangle $ABM$.
The lines $AC$, $CM$, and $BC$ form the triangle $ACB$.
